name: Frozen
description: Frozen solid, preventing all movement and actions.

name: Posion
description: Deals posion damage and reduces healing received

name: Shadow Corruption
description: Corrupting shadow energy that saps life.

name: Stunned
description: Stunned and incapacitated, unable to act.

name: Blind Rebuke
description: Reduced critical strike chance after block.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Lightning damage jumps to nearby targets.

name: Corrosion
description: Deals damage and reduces armor by 10 while active.

name: Frostbite
description: Slows target and deals minor cold damage.

name: Shock Pulse
description: Pulses small shock damage and reduces attack speed by 10%

name: Rage
description: Grants 20% increased damage but take 10% more.

name: Echo Mark
description: Stores 30% of damage taken and releases it after expiry.
